name: ISDB
tagline: A database of In-Silico predicted MS/MS spectrum of Natural Products
body:
### Welcome to ISDB GitHub Page. Here you will find the full _In-Silico_ Database (ISDB) described in the paper **"Integration of Molecular Networking and In-Silico MS/MS Fragmentation for Natural Products Dereplication"**. This ISDB contains _in-silico_ predicted MS/MS fragmentation spectrum in positive ion mode for 170 602 Natural Products (NPs) found in the UNPD (Universal Natural Products Database). ### How to use the ISDB ? Instructions for using this ISDB in a dereplication workflow are available as pdf here: [workflow](https://github.com/oolonek/ISDB/blob/master/Data/doc/workflow.pdf) ### Links. * The GNPS (Global Natural Products Social molecular networking) platform is accessible here : [GNPS](http://gnps.ucsd.edu/ProteoSAFe/static/gnps-splash.jsp) * The Tremolo tool used for the spectral matching against the ISDB is included inside the ISDB zip file. It's documentation is available here : [Tremolo](http://proteomics.ucsd.edu/Software/Tremolo/#Documentation) * The UNPD is accessible here : [UNPD](http://pkuxxj.pku.edu.cn/UNPD/) ## Contact Want to complement the existing ISDB (other compounds, negative mode, adducts ...) ? Improvement, suggestions ? Please contact us :
***
